create_account.title: Create a passkey
create_account.description: The passkey that you will create will be associated to the a device of your choice. Make sure you create your passkey on a personal device.

validate_wallet.title: Validate your wallet
validate_wallet.description: Validate your wallet by verifying your identity with your passkey.

create_passkey.title: Create a passkey
create_passkey.description: The passkey that you will create will be associated to the a device of your choice. Make sure you create your passkey on a personal device.
create_passkey.alert_title: We will not be able to recover your passkeys
create_passkey.alert_description: Make sure you create your passkey on a personal device.

signature_request.title: You are signing:
signature_request.warning_content: Only sign this message if you fully understand the content and trust the requesting site.

form.email_description: This email will be use for notification. It can be different from your authentification email. You will be able to change it whenever you want.

error.title: Error
error.an_error_occured: Please try refreshing the page, or return back later.

authentication.login: You have been logged in successfully
authentication.logout: You have been logged out successfully

file_input.title: Profile picture
file_input.description: We recommend that you use an image of at least {{recommandedWidth}} x {{recommandedHeight}} pixels and that it is no larger than {{maxMbSize}} MB. Import a PNG or JPEG file.
